alert.note: Alert for Breathitt; Knott; Magoffin; Wolfe (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 29 at 8:25AM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Knott, Breathitt, southern Magoffin and south central Wolfe Counties through 900 AM EDT... At 825 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Frozen Creek, or over Jackson, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Keck, Inverness, Dumont, Taulbee, Moct and Howard Creek around 830 AM EDT. Noctor, Haginsville, Portsmouth, Smith Branch, Quicksand, Haddix, Rock Lick and Lost Creek around 835 AM EDT. Stevenson, Press, Wilstacy, Flintville, Bays, Clayhole and Mountain Valley around 840 AM EDT. Sikes, Camp Lewis, Rousseau, Guage, Hardshell and Cornelia around 845 AM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Lunah, Noble, Daisydell, Lambric, Decoy, Evanston, Tiptop, Duco, Elmrock, Buck and Carver Station. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
